= Microsoft CHM (Compiled HTML Help) content

The `.chm` files in this directory are openly licensed content packaged by
various developers.

The following files were packaged by @ike9000e and obtained at the following
location:

`lua_5x2_reference_manual_r0x1_20141013.chm`:: the Lua reference manual, at
https://github.com/ike9000e/Offline-Doc-Collection/blob/master/docs_001/lua_5x2_reference_manual_r0x1_20141013.chm

`imlib2_doc_v1x1x1_r1x0_20171019.chm`:: the Imlib 2 reference manual, at
https://github.com/ike9000e/Offline-Doc-Collection/blob/master/docs_001/imlib2_doc_v1x1x1_r1x0_20171019.chm

We thank you for packaging and distributing open content!
